trans-unit.source: Selects the local Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) certificate used for authentication.
trans-unit.target: Velg lokale Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) sertifikatet som brukes for godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: This delegate is used to construct instances of the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne representanten brukes til å konstruere forekomster av <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>klassen.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> class is used to help secure information exchanged between a client and server.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>klassen brukes til å sikre informasjon utveksles mellom klienten og serveren.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>

trans-unit.source: The client and server use this delegate to select a certificate to be used for authentication.
trans-unit.target: Klienten og serveren Bruk denne representanten velge et sertifikat som skal brukes for godkjenning.
